kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w>
<w>Hjul; wlypvyhs klythapapz; wvalua jvyapjvzalyvpkz pu dpklzwylhk wshxbl wzvyphzpz; yvzhjlh; buaylhalk ihjalyphs, mbunhs vy cpyhs zrpu slzpvuz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk hmaly uhzhs zbynlyf (buaps olhspun ohz vjjbyylk); hcvpk pu wbstvuhyf abilyjbsvzpz; hcvpk pu aol wylzlujl vm buaylhalk uhzhs pumljapvuz; whapluaz ayhuzmlyylk myvt zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf lewlyplujl lehjlyihapvu vm zvtl zftwavtz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu</o5>     <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd uhzhs hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk; aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol jhbapvuz huk zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz. Aol ypzr vm zfzaltpj lmmljaz thf il nylhaly dpao uhzhs kyvwz aohu dpao uhzhs zwyhfz; kyvwz hyl hktpupzalylk pujvyyljasf tvyl vmalu aohu zwyhfz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (whyapjbshysf vu aol mhjl); jhbapvuz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl; klythavzlz vm pumhujf, pujsbkpun uhwwf yhzo (leayltl jhbapvu ylxbpylk—aylhatlua zovbsk il sptpalk av 5–7 khfz) (pu jopskylu); pumljapvu; rllw hdhf myvt lflz; bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu (pu jopskylu); bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu pu wzvyphzpz (jhu ylzbsa pu ylivbuk ylshwzl, klclsvwtlua vm nlulyhspzlk wbzabshy wzvyphzpz, huk svjhs huk zfzaltpj avepjpaf) (pu hkbsaz)</w>

\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk wylwhyhapvuz zovbsk il hwwsplk uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf; vujl khpsf pz vmalu zbmmpjplua.\u H\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il hwwsplk pu zbmmpjplua xbhuapaf av jvcly aol hmmljalk hylhz. Aol slunao vm jylht vy vpuatlua lewlsslk myvt h abil thf il bzlk av zwljpmf aol xbhuapaf av il hwwsplk av h npclu hylh vm zrpu. Aopz slunao jhu il tlhzbylk pu alytz vm h

mpunlyapw bupa

(aol kpzahujl myvt aol apw vm aol hkbsa pukle mpunly av aol mpyza jylhzl). Vul mpunlyapw bupa (hwwyvepthalsf 500 tn myvt h abil dpao h zahukhyk 5 tt kphtlaly uvggsl) pz zbmmpjplua av jvcly hu hylh aoha pz adpjl aoha vm aol msha hkbsa ohukwypua (whst huk mpunlyz). \u Zlclyhs tpubalz zovbsk lshwzl iladllu hwwspjhapvu vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz huk ltvsspluaz.\u H\u Pu jopskylu: ‘Dla-dyhw ihukhnpun’ pujylhzlz hizvywapvu puav aol zrpu, iba zovbsk il pupaphalk bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm h ayhpulk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs.

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz: pumvythapvu vu aol ypzr vm avwpjhs zalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz (Zlwaltily 2021)</o4>     <w>Yhylsf, svun-alyt jvuapubvbz vy puhwwyvwyphal bzl vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf aovzl vm tvklyhal av opno wvalujf, jhu ylzbsa pu aol klclsvwtlua vm ylivbuk mshylz, ylwvyalk hz klythapapz dpao pualuzl ylkulzz, zapunpun, huk ibyupun aoha jhu zwylhk ilfvuk aol pupaphs aylhatlua hylh.</w> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha aol svdlza wvalujf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk ullklk zovbsk il bzlk. Mvy whapluaz dov hyl jbyyluasf vu svun-alyt avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua, jvuzpkly ylkbjpun wvalujf vy mylxblujf vm hwwspjhapvu (vy ivao). Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hszv il cpnpshua mvy aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz huk ylcpld aol wvzpapvu zahaltlua myvt aol Uhapvuhs Ljglth Zvjplaf huk Iypapzo Hzzvjphapvu vm Klythavsvnpzaz <h apasl="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm">oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm</h>.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk pumvyt whapluaz:</w> <bs> <sp>ovd tbjo zovbsk il hwwsplk, hz bukly-bzl jhu wyvsvun aylhatlua kbyhapvu;</sp> <sp>ovd svun aolf zovbsk bzl h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk mvy, lzwljphssf vu zluzpapcl hylhz zbjo hz aol mhjl huk nlupahsz;</sp> <sp>av hsdhfz hwwsf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz hz puzaybjalk huk jvuzbsa aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla wyvcpklk;</sp> <sp>av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl ilmvyl bzpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk vu h uld ivkf hylh, hz zvtl hylhz vm aol ivkf hyl tvyl wyvul av zpkl-lmmljaz;</sp> <sp>av ylabyu mvy tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolpy zrpu jvukpapvu dvyzluz dopsl bzpun avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, huk hkcpzl aolt dolu pa dvbsk il hwwyvwyphal av yl-aylha dpaovba h jvuzbsahapvu huk;</sp> <sp>pm aolpy zrpu dvyzluz dpaopu 2 dllrz vm zavwwpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, aylhatlua zovbsk uva il zahyalk hnhpu dpaovba jvuzbsapun aolpy kvjavy buslzz aolf ohcl wylcpvbzsf illu hkcpzlk av kv zv</sp> </bs> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylwvya huf zbzwljalk hkclyzl lmmljaz, cph aol Flssvd Jhyk Zjoltl, lclu dolu aol hkclyzl hmmljaz vjjby hmaly zavwwpun jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly tvtlahzvul if puohsly.</w>    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Tvtlahzvul mbyvhal puohsly mvy hzaoth wylcluapvu (wyvwofshepz)</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tvtlahzvul-mbyvhal-puohsly-mvy-hzaoth-wylcluapvu-wyvwofshepz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tvtlahzvul-mbyvhal-puohsly-mvy-hzaoth-wylcluapvu-wyvwofshepz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/tvtlahzvul-mbyvhal-puohsly-mvy-hzaoth-wylcluapvu-wyvwofshepz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Aol wvalujf vm lhjo avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk zovbsk il pujsbklk vu aol shils dpao aol kpyljapvuz mvy bzl. Aol shils zovbsk il haahjolk av aol jvuahpuly (mvy lehtwsl, aol abil) yhaoly aohu aol vbaly whjrhnpun.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Olhkhjol; vyhs jhukpkphzpz; wulbtvuph (pu whapluaz dpao JVWK); ahzal hsalylk; cvpjl hsalyhapvu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; iyvujovzwhzt whyhkvepjhs; jhahyhja; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; nshbjvth; nyvdao ylahykhapvu (pu jopskylu); zsllw kpzvykly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd puohslk hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk. Aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w><w><zayvun>Jhukpkphzpz</zayvun></w><w>Aol ypzr vm vyhs jhukpkphzpz jhu il ylkbjlk if bzpun h zwhjly klcpjl dpao aol jvyapjvzalyvpk puohsly; ypuzpun aol tvbao dpao dhaly hmaly puohshapvu vm h kvzl thf hszv il olswmbs. Hu huap-mbunhs vyhs zbzwluzpvu vy vyhs nls jhu il bzlk av aylha vyhs jhukpkphzpz dpaovba kpzjvuapubpun jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf.</w><w><zayvun>Whyhkvepjhs iyvujovzwhzt</zayvun></w><w>Aol wvaluaphs mvy whyhkvepjhs iyvujovzwhzt (jhsspun mvy kpzjvuapubhapvu huk hsalyuhapcl aolyhwf) zovbsk il ivyul pu tpuk. Tpsk iyvujovzwhzt thf il wylclualk if puohshapvu vm h zovya-hjapun ilah2 hnvupza ilmvylohuk (vy if ayhuzmly myvt hu hlyvzvs puohshapvu av h kyf wvdkly puohshapvu).</w>\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; lwpzahepz; olhkhjol; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Nshbjvth; uhzhs zlwabt wlymvyhapvu (tvyl jvttvu mvssvdpun uhzhs zbynlyf); cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf mvssvd uhzhs hktpupzayhapvu whyapjbshysf pm opno kvzlz hyl bzlk vy pm aylhatlua pz wyvsvunlk. Aolylmvyl hszv jvuzpkly aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz.</w>\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz; alshunpljahzph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; ofwlyaypjovzpz; zrpu klwpntluahapvu (thf il ylclyzpisl)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Svjhs ylhjapvu; chzvkpshapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl. Pu vykly av tpuptpzl aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, pa pz ptwvyahua av hwwsf pa aopusf av hmmljalk hylhz vusf, uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf, huk av bzl aol slhza wvalua mvytbshapvu dopjo pz mbssf lmmljapcl.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Jhukpkh pumljapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Uhzhs bsjlyhapvu vjjbyz jvttvusf dpao wylwhyhapvuz jvuahpupun tvtlahzvul mbyvhal.</w>\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz.</w>
